data.text: #Aquaman has passed $100 million at the worldwide box office, being Nicole Kidmans' 19th film to do so. She is one of only four actresses to achieve this amount. https://t.co/pqygyYBS4X

Two years in a row, @FocusFeatures' biggest opening weekend average of year belongs to a Nicole Kidman film; #TheBeguiled (2017) and #BoyErased (2018).

Additionally, both movies have ranked among Kidman's biggest opening averages in her career, proving a very powerful combo https://t.co/JLrYiUuleE

Nicole Kidman’s best opening averages:

01 $83,770 - Moulin Rouge!
02 $64,308 - Nine
03 $57,323 - Beguiled
04 *NEW* $41,411 #BoyErased 
05 $40,517 - Margot at the Wedding
06 $35,137 - To Die For
07 $30,840 - Lion
08 $30,783 - Hours
09 $28,780 - Sacred Deer
10 $22,935 - Stoker https://t.co/tEkVHkZHcd

Nicole Kidman has done it again! Her new film #BoyErased received a great start, as it had the highest theater average of any release this weekend.

@BoyErased also marked a higher debut than Kidman's most recent award hopeful Lion, despite being released in more theaters. https://t.co/gl0GzEiZ5R

Nicole Kidman’s best opening averages:

01 $83,770 - Moulin Rouge!
02 $64,308 - Nine
03 $57,323 - The Beguiled
04 *NEW* $44,000 #BoyErased 
05 $40,517 - Margot at the Wedding
06 $35,137 - To Die For
07 $30,840 - Lion
08 $30,783 - Hours
09 $28,780 - Sacred Deer
10 $22,935 - Stoker https://t.co/HwxS1YsKCi

Nicole Kidman's first release of her busy season is #BoyErased, which will follow a similar release pattern to Lion; An early November start in 5 theaters and later a slow expansion during Thanksgiving. https://t.co/lD5Op1YNgh

(cont.)
Nicole Kidman's current domestic total is at $1,731,003,320.

In order to join the surprisingly-rare $2 billion club for actresses, she will need #Aquaman to pass $200 million and a domestic over-performance for @TheUpsideFilm. https://t.co/mUng8ZFFXW
